Nesta linha estгo associadas as pesquisas de avaliaзгo de tйcnicas e ferramentas de teste de software, propostas de novas tйcnicas e ferramentas, gestгo do processo de teste de software e as mйtricas envolvidas no processo de teste de software.

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 2013 Tenth International Conference on Information Technology: New Generations (ITNG)
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: 2013 10th International Conference on Information Technology: New Generations

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: In recent years, interdisciplinarity has represented one of the most widely used and encouraged teaching practices among educators. This practice has generated a promising expectation of success when applied to undergraduate programs. However, its implementation requires dedication and effort from both students and professors. Through a case study, this paper promotes an analysis about this issue and describes some social games as final product from an interdisciplinary case study, named Project Differences.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: In recent years, interdisciplinarity has represented one of the most widely used and encouraged teaching practices among educators. This practice has generated a promising expectation of success when applied to undergraduate programs. However, its implementation requires dedication and effort from both students and professors. Through a case study, this paper promotes an analysis about this issue and describes some social games as final product from an interdisciplinary case study, named Project Differences.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Applying Testing to Enhance Software Product Quality
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Applying Testing to Enhance Software Product Quality

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 2013 Tenth International Conference on Information Technology: New Generations (ITNG)
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: 2013 10th International Conference on Information Technology: New Generations

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Software free from defects is a goal to be ideally achieved. Defects in software do arise from the development process. A possible solution for quality improvement is to apply a reference framework for software testing during all development phases. What is needed is a software testing process performed along with its development, in an orderly and simple way, even if the software development have been conducted in an organization without maturity certification. This investigation proposes to validate the hypothesis: software product quality is dependent on the software testing. In order to verify and validate the proposed hypothesis, it was applied to a case study, in which the statistical technique for Pearson's Chi-Square was used to determine whether there is a significant relationship among the categorical variables based on software testing results. This case study was derived from an actual project at the Brazilian Aeronautics Institute of Technology and its preliminary results are promising.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Software free from defects is a goal to be ideally achieved. Defects in software do arise from the development process. A possible solution for quality improvement is to apply a reference framework for software testing during all development phases. What is needed is a software testing process performed along with its development, in an orderly and simple way, even if the software development have been conducted in an organization without maturity certification. This investigation proposes to validate the hypothesis: software product quality is dependent on the software testing. In order to verify and validate the proposed hypothesis, it was applied to a case study, in which the statistical technique for Pearson's Chi-Square was used to determine whether there is a significant relationship among the categorical variables based on software testing results. This case study was derived from an actual project at the Brazilian Aeronautics Institute of Technology and its preliminary results are promising.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Applying Acceptance Test Driven Development to a Problem Based Learning Academic Real-Time System
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Applying Acceptance Test Driven Development to a Problem Based Learning Academic Real-Time System

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.NOME-DO-EVENTO: 11th International Conference on Information Technology: New Generations, 2014
DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: Proceedings do 11th International Conference on Information Technology: New Generations, 2014

PALAVRAS-CHAVE.PALAVRA-CHAVE-5: unauthorized access control and fraud detection

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This paper focuses on the importance of test driven development, in an interdisciplinary academic case study, involving unauthorized access and fraud. In it, Problem Based Learning (PBL) enabled the organization of an environment for diverse knowledge and skills, favorable to experimentation and prototyping of new models, methods, techniques, and tools. The application of the principles of agile methods aimed at overcoming difficulties related to the computer systems development, such as requirement changes, uncertainties, and risks, in order to improve quality. Unlike traditional methodologies, tests were used since the beginning of the development lifecycle with Acceptance Test Driven Development (ATDD). The agile testing quadrants guided the categorized elaboration of tests during unit testing, integration testing, system testing, and acceptance testing phases. The main contribution of this article was the integrated application of PBL, ATDD, and agile development in the case study of a Real-Time Embedded System for Unauthorized Access Control and Fraud Detection (Sistema Embarcado de Tempo Real para Controle de Acessos Indevidos e Deteccao de Fraudes -- SETRAIF).
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper focuses on the importance of test driven development, in an interdisciplinary academic case study, involving unauthorized access and fraud. In it, Problem Based Learning (PBL) enabled the organization of an environment for diverse knowledge and skills, favorable to experimentation and prototyping of new models, methods, techniques, and tools. The application of the principles of agile methods aimed at overcoming difficulties related to the computer systems development, such as requirement changes, uncertainties, and risks, in order to improve quality. Unlike traditional methodologies, tests were used since the beginning of the development lifecycle with Acceptance Test Driven Development (ATDD). The agile testing quadrants guided the categorized elaboration of tests during unit testing, integration testing, system testing, and acceptance testing phases. The main contribution of this article was the integrated application of PBL, ATDD, and agile development in the case study of a Real-Time Embedded System for Unauthorized Access Control and Fraud Detection (Sistema Embarcado de Tempo Real para Controle de Acessos Indevidos e Deteccao de Fraudes -- SETRAIF).

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: In recent years, interdisciplinarity has represented one of the most widely used and encouraged teaching practices among educators. This practice has been generating a promising expectation of success when applied on graduate courses. However, its implementation requires dedication and effort from both students and professors. This poster describes a case study carried out. In addition, professors and students have evaluated the process.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: In recent years, interdisciplinarity has represented one of the most widely used and encouraged teaching practices among educators. This practice has been generating a promising expectation of success when applied on graduate courses. However, its implementation requires dedication and effort from both students and professors. This poster describes a case study carried out. In addition, professors and students have evaluated the process.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TEXTO.TITULO-DO-TEXTO: VANT-EC-SAME: Um Protуtipo de Sistema de Software

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TEXTO.TITULO-DO-JORNAL-OU-REVISTA: Revista de Informбtica da Faculdade Mater Dei - TECSUL - Tecnologia da Informaзгo no Sudoeste do Paranб

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Este artigo apresenta um protуtipo de Sistema de Software Embarcado de Tempo Real (SSETR), utilizando o Processo Unificado da Rational - PUR (Rational Unified Process - RUP). Ele engloba as quatro fases do RUP (Iniciaзгo, Elaboraзгo, Construзгo e Transiзгo). O protуtipo foi desenvolvido em trкs nнveis de integraзгo, a partir de Unidades de Software de Computador (USCs), integradas em Componentes de Software de Computador (CSCs), integrados em Itens de Configuraзгo de Software de Computador (ICSCs), atй a integraзгo final num sу Sistema de Software de Computador (SSC).
